/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, rise high into the sky, their windows reflecting the bright sunlight. The trees, lush and green, provide a stark contrast to the urban landscape. People can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, ready to whisk their owners away at a moment's notice. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm glow.
